verses.verse: Now <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> was <S%H5462>directly<s%> shut <S%H5462>up<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: none went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and none came <S%H935>in<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1368>there<s%>, and the mighty men of <S%H2428>valor<s%>.

And you shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, all you <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and go round <S%H5362>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6471>once<s%>. Thus shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams<s%>' horns: and the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H4900>pass<s%>, that when they make a long blast with the <S%H3104>ram<s%>'s <S%H7161>horn<s%>, and when you <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H7321>shout<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout<s%>; and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall fall <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H8478>flat<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall ascend <S%H5927>up<s%> every man straight before <S%H376>him<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5375>them<s%>, Take up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and let <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams<s%>' horns <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, Pass <S%H5674>on<s%>, and <S%H5437>compass<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and let him that is <S%H2502>armed<s%> pass <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3091>pass<s%>, when Joshua had <S%H559>spoken<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams<s%>' horns passed <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>: and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310>them<s%>.

And the <S%H2502>armed<s%> men <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>, and the <S%H622>rereward<s%> <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>, the priests going <S%H1980>on<s%>, and <S%H8628>blowing<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, You shall not <S%H7321>shout<s%>, nor make any <S%H8085>noise<s%> with your <S%H6963>voice<s%>, neither shall any <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H3318>proceed<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, until the <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H559>bid<s%> you <S%H7321>shout<s%>; then shall you <S%H7321>shout<s%>.

So the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, going <S%H5362>about<s%> it <S%H6471>once<s%>: and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams<s%>' horns <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> went <S%H1980>on<s%> <S%H1980>continually<s%>, and <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>: and the armed <S%H2502>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H622>them<s%>; but the rereward <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the priests going <S%H1980>on<s%>, and <S%H8628>blowing<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>.

And the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6471>once<s%>, and <S%H7725>returned<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>: so they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that they rose <S%H7925>early<s%> about the <S%H5927>dawning<s%> of the <S%H7837>day<s%>, and <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> after the same <S%H4941>manner<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>: only on that <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%>, when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>, <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H7321>Shout<s%>; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H2764>accursed<s%>, even <S%H3068>it<s%>, and all that are in it, to the Lord: only <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>, she and all that are with her in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, because she <S%H2244>hid<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> that we <S%H7971>sent<s%>.

And <S%H7535>you<s%>, in any wise <S%H8104>keep<s%> yourselves from the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%>, lest you make yourselves <S%H2763>accursed<s%>, when you <S%H3947>take<s%> of the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%>, and <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H2764>curse<s%>, and trouble <S%H5916>it<s%>.

But all the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%>, are <S%H6944>consecrated<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: they shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> when the priests <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>: and it came to <S%H5971>pass<s%>, when the people <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout<s%>, that the <S%H2346>wall<s%> fell down <S%H5307>flat<s%>, so that the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> straight before <S%H3920>him<s%>, and they took the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And they utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> all that was in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, both <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H2205>old<s%>, and <S%H7794>ox<s%>, and <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, and <S%H2543>donkey<s%>, with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that had spied <S%H7270>out<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%>, <S%H935>Go<s%> into the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and bring <S%H3318>out<s%> there the <S%H802>woman<s%>, and all that she <S%H7650>has<s%>, as you swore unto her.

And the young <S%H5288>men<s%> that were <S%H7270>spies<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%>, and brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab<s%>, and her <S%H1>father<s%>, and her <S%H517>mother<s%>, and her <S%H251>brothers<s%>, and all that she <S%H3318>had<s%>; and they brought out all her <S%H4940>relatives<s%>, and <S%H3240>left<s%> them <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And they <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and all that was in <S%H3701>it<s%>: only the silver, and the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and of <S%H1270>iron<s%>, they <S%H5414>put<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2421>saved<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%>, and her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>household<s%>, and all that she <S%H3427>had<s%>; and she dwells <S%H7130>in<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>; because she <S%H2244>hid<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%>, which <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to spy <S%H7270>out<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7650>adjured<s%> them at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that rises <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H1129>builds<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>: he shall lay the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> there in his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, and in his <S%H6810>youngest<s%> son shall he set <S%H5324>up<s%> the gates of <S%H1817>it<s%>.
So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>; and his <S%H8089>fame<s%> was noised throughout all the <S%H776>country<s%>.
